credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in counted cross, satin and eye stitches on plain weave foundation
description:
Multiple bands of alphabets and numerals separated by narrow cross borders, followed by a verse and inscription. At the bottom are trees, squirrels and deer. 
The verse reads: 
Learn a pace to grow in grace that Heaven may be thy dwelling place  
Mary Lufman, May the 3 1798
name: Sampler
